snippet: Six weeks after voters made Colorado one of two states to legalize the recreational use of marijuana, a task force started to determine how the state will regulate its use.
abstract: Task force is started to determine how Colorado will regulate marijuana use six weeks after voters made it one of two states to legalize recreational use;  array of state officers as well as various marijuana advocates will weigh in on issues such as identification of revenue sources and prospect of federal government cracking down on the drug.
lead_paragraph: Six weeks after voters made Colorado one of two states to legalize the recreational use of marijuana, a task force started to determine how the state will regulate its use.

headline.seo: Task Force Created to Regulate Legalized Marijuana in Colorado
headline.main: In Colorado, Getting Down to Business of Marijuana
headline.print_headline: In Colorado, Getting Down To Business of Marijuana
